title: Choose your powers
body:
You can have 1 of the three listed powers
1) Superhuman Regeneration
2) Invisibility 
3) The power to predict how a match is going to go before it even happens
HOWEVER
you must now pick 1 of the 3 downsides to having said power
1) Loss of hearing and taste
2) Every night at 8:00 pm you will take the form of an ant ( Which means you will have a large chance of being consumed by spiders and ETC ) and at 8:00 AM you will take the form of a human once again
3) You will never be loved


Interested to see how this Is going to turn out ; )
